summary: An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle, at the general election to be held in such city on Tuesday, November 8, 1910, the proposition of the issuance and sale by said city of its negotiable bonds in the sum of $1,000,000.00 for the purpose of providing moneys for the construction of a city hall building on block 38, C. D. Boren's Addition to the City of Seattle.
